content.text: Hey there, what do you do for fun?
I like to make music and have an imaginary world I can immerse myself in.
That sounds great, do you play any instruments?
Wow that's awesome! What is your favorite genre of music to make?
I like to make alternative rock music. What do you enjoy doing for fun?
I like to go fishing, hiking, and camping. I also like to play sports and watch sports.
That's great! I love dogs, do you have any pets?
I have a cat named Oliver.
That's great! I'm allergic to cats
